snippet: A lawsuit may finally give prisoners a chance to expose inhumane conditions.
abstract: Editorial urges federal appeals court to order the United States military to preserve tapes of force-feeding of detainees on hunger strike at Guantanamo Bay prison facility and hand them over to lawyers for detainees filing complaints of inhumane treatment; contends videos provide one of the most promising avenues in struggle to expose woeful situation at prison to greater public attention.
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit may finally give prisoners a chance to expose inhumane conditions.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
